DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether a single intra-articular injection of Durolane is superior to a single injection of PBS for the relief of joint pain in patients with osteoarthritis of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: Durolane Versus Phosphate Buffered Saline (PBS) in Knee Osteoarthritis
